name: California Roll
description: A classic sushi roll with crab, avocado, cucumber, and mayonnaise.

name: Spicy Tuna Roll
description: A roll made with spicy tuna, cucumber, and sometimes avocado.

name: Dragon Roll
description: A sushi roll with eel, avocado, and sometimes imitation crab.

name: Rainbow Roll
description: A colorful sushi roll with various types of fish on top.

name: Tempura Roll
description: A roll with tempura-fried ingredients like shrimp or vegetables.

name: Nigiri Sushi
description: Hand-pressed sushi with a slice of fish on top of a small bed of rice.

name: Sashimi
description: Thin slices of raw fish, often served with soy sauce and wasabi.

name: Maki Roll
description: A general term for rolled sushi, including various fillings and wraps.
